file_content.text: I anticipate great things for you, young one. My regards to your master.
Choose the path that will become your destiny.
There you are. You have attracted more than Darth Baras's attention, young one.
I'm Lord Lokar. I am called upon to promote especially promising Sith, and you have been deemed worthy of my guidance.
I have no intention of becoming a problem for my master.
I serve Baras faithfully.
In time, perhaps he'll give you a reason.
I'm not here for your entertainment.
Let's get on with this.
Right you are.
You will choose between two disciplines. One follows the path of Marka Ragnos, who focused the dark side to become nearly unwoundable in battle.
The other one was mastered by Naga Sadow, who could intuit where his foe was weakest and then strike precisely with devastating effect.
I hand you over to Lord Krimyn. Tell him the path you choose, and he will complete this phase of your training.
You have my thanks.
I appreciate it.
When I'm good and ready.
Not yet.
Give it thought. With time, one or the other will resonate.
I will be the strongest Sith you've ever seen.
Time to begin my domination.
Let your aspirations fuel you.
I hope someday you eclipse your master. Good luck to you.
You are not ready to see me.
What kind of guidance do you provide?
What does this involve?
I will expose you to what Darth Baras will not.
